name: 0idnsgd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cpr(csn(c0), c1), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → { { c0 }, c1 } ⊆(NrmSGrp ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → { c0 } ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cpr(csn(c0), c1), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → { { c0 }, c1 } ⊆(NrmSGrp ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → { c0 } ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cnsg, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → { c0 } ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ Grp → { c0 } ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cpr(csn(c0), c1), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → { { c0 }, c1 } ⊆(NrmSGrp ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ Grp → { c0 } ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(csn(c0), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c2))

cumulated.origin:

-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c2))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c2)), wcel(c2, cgrp))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c1 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Grp)
⊣ (c2 ∈ Grp → c1 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cpr(csn(c0), c1), cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(c0g, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c2)))

⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Grp)
⊣ c0 =(0 ` c2)
⊣ (c2 ∈ Grp → c1 ∈(NrmSGrp ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(c1, cfv(cnsg, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))

cumulated.origin:

comment: The whole group and the zero subgroup are normal subgroups of a group. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
